Parameters:

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Ship> pShipList,
                 int pPlayerID,
                 int pTargetedShipID)
Draws the parts of the HUD on-screen

Parameters:
g - Graphics object that will be used to draw on-screen HUD elements
pShipList - HashMap of ships in the game world
pPlayerID - ID number of the player's ship
pTargetedShipID - ID number of the currently targeted enemy ship
